about.description: Write a compelling description about yourself, your expertise, and what drives you as a professional. This should be 2-3 sentences that capture your professional identity.
about.secondary: Add a secondary paragraph about your journey, interests, or what makes you unique in your field.

experience.title: Your Job Title
responsibilities: Describe your key achievement or responsibility here
Add another significant accomplishment or duty
Include specific technologies, metrics, or impact when possible
Copy this object to add more experience entries

projects.title: Project Name
projects.shortDescription: Brief one-sentence description of what this project does and its main value.
projects.detailedDescription:
Detailed description of your project. Explain the problem it solves, your approach, technologies used (wrap important tech in **asterisks** for highlighting), and the impact or results.

You can use multiple paragraphs by adding \n\n between them. Technologies wrapped in **double asterisks** will be highlighted as skill pills in the modal.

Include specific achievements, metrics, or notable features that demonstrate your technical skills and problem-solving abilities.
